column1: Health officials seem concerned about #coronavirus #COVID19 because: 1. We as a species have no immunity; no drugs tho trials planned; no vaccine, tho experiments abound 2. Even tho only 20% of the 40-70% who get it have severe symptoms, this is enough to overwhelm hospitals
